name: A Night in Itaewon
description:
The date? April 25th. The time?  8pm. The place? Itaewon. You are an idol from one of the bigger boy groups in South Korea and tonight you have one goal in mind: to enjoy a night out with the boys~ You're part of the 97-line and everyone's here except for. What losers. You guys finally get a bit of a break in between schedules becaue of the coronavirus outbreak and they're missing out on the opportunity for some well-deserved partying. 

It's a short game but please play it fondly!
